faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate your billing.
faq.q2: What happens to my data if I cancel?
faq.a2: Your data is retained for 30 days after cancellation. During this time, you can reactivate your subscription to recover everything.
faq.a3: Monthly credits included in your plan renew each billing cycle and expire at the end of the period. Purchased credit packs NEVER expire - they stay in your account until used!
faq.a4: Yes! All new accounts get a 7-day free trial with full access to all features.
